snippet: The American, Malik John, had surrendered earlier in the day on the edge of Barawe, about 135 miles southwest of the capital, Mogadishu.
abstract: Somali authorities announce American citizen Malik John has surrendered; John, originally from Maryland, had fought for Shabab militant group.
lead_paragraph: The American, Malik John, had surrendered earlier in the day on the edge of Barawe, about 135 miles southwest of the capital, Mogadishu.

headline.main: Somalia: Maryland Man Who Fought for Shabab Surrenders After Fleeing
headline.print_headline: Africa; Somalia: Maryland Man Who Fought for Shabab Surrenders After Fleeing
